<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Balisse Feather](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3406)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Holy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=517" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 305 <sup>1.1</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You deal damage using the affixed weapon to a creature that has the [unholy trait](/Traits.aspx?ID=521) or that you witnessed harm an ally, an innocent, or noncombatant within the last minute.

 
</row>

</column>

---

This long, fire-red feather smolders from the weapon it adorns. When you activate the feather, the creature you damaged burns with sacred light. The creature must succeed at a DC 29 Will save or take a –2 status penalty to AC and saving throws and reduce its resistances by 5. These effects last until the end of your next turn. This item has no effect on a creature with the [holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517) trait.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
